text: The 2011 British motorcycle Grand Prix was the sixth round of the 2011 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season. It took place on the weekend of 10–12 June 2011 at Silverstone. The race was won by Casey Stoner, who had also taken pole position. Andrea Dovizioso, Casey Stoner and Colin Edwards, celebrating on the podium after finishing second, first and third in the MotoGP race. ==MotoGP classification== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !
